result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. GORDON DEEN LASHLEY

records.addlTxt:
9:06 AM Defendant GORDON DEEN LASHLEY in court.  Attorney William A. Schembera in court for GORDON DEEN LASHLEY.  Prosecuting attorney Sheila M. Yohnk in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
22CF129 & 22CF39
Information to be filed mirroring Complaint. 
Defendant informed of charges and penalties. 
Defendant Advised of Constitutional Rights. 
22CF39, Ct. 1: Defendant enters no contest plea. 
Acknowledges prior conviction(s). 
Factual basis and probable cause found. 
Court accepts pleas as voluntarily, knowingly and intelligently made and finds defendant guilty.

Court orders: 
S/W - 30 months probation (34 days credit if revoked:
Absolute sobriety
No intoxicants
No bars/para/shot/noact
Any counseling 
$518
DNA

22CF129, uncharged DA 22CH328 & remaining counts DRI

State requests cash bond
Attorney Schembera objects.
Defendant makes statement.

10:01 AM Defendant GORDON DEEN LASHLEY appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney William A. Schembera in court for GORDON DEEN LASHLEY.  Prosecuting attorney Sara Matthews in court for the State of Wisconsin.
Review hearing scheduled for September 28, 2022 at 09:00 am.

10:01 AM Prosecuting attorney Roy La Barton Gay in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant GORDON DEEN LASHLEY not in court.  Attorney William A. Schembera in court for GORDON DEEN LASHLEY. 
Body, Adjacent States

11:00 AM Prosecuting attorney Lawrence Jean Broeren in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant GORDON DEEN LASHLEY not in court.  Attorney William A. Schembera in court for GORDON DEEN LASHLEY. To be recalled.
11:05 AM - RECALLED- Appearances the same. Attorney Schembera advises Defendant had transportation issues.
Review hearing scheduled for August 17, 2022 at 10:00 am.
